price: ߤߍ߲߬ ߌߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߬ߝߐ߬ߓߊ߮߸ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߣߵߌ ߗߋ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߛߙߋ ߣߌ߫ ߘߟߊߝߎߟߊ ߣߌ߫ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ ߘߌ߫
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ شَٰهِدٗا وَمُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu innā arsalnāka shāhidan wamubashiran wanadhīran
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
